summary: "Wizards of Waverly Place" was a popular Disney Channel show about a teen wizard named Alex and her magical siblings. They lived in New York City and trained to become powerful wizards. Alex often used magic irresponsibly while trying to keep her powers secret. The show ran from 2007 to 2012 and was a big hit, winning several Emmy Awards. It launched Selena Gomez's music career and a movie and sequel series are in the works.
title: Wizards of Waverly Place
